00166    unsigned long value;

00170    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00171    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00172 
00173    n = 1 << (8 + 4);
00174 
00175    value = 0;
00176    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00177       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00178 
00179       ADCINT = 0;
00180       ADBUSY = 1;
00181       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00182 
00183       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00184 
00185       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00186       watchdog_refresh();
00187    }
00188 
00189    value >>= 8;
00190 
00191    /* convert to volts */
00192    gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 2.5;
00193 
00194    /* external voltage divider */
00195    gvalue *= 0.5 * user_conf.gain_cal;
00196 
00197    /* convert to Ohms (15V supply, 2kOhm resistor) */
00198    gvalue = (2000 * gvalue) / (15 - gvalue);
00199 
00200    /* convert Ohms to Celsius, valid -100.100 deg., error <0.04K */
00201    gvalue -= 100;
00202    gvalue = 0.0011 * gvalue * gvalue + 2.5558 * gvalue;
00203 
00204    /* correct for offset */
00205    gvalue += user_conf.ofs_cal;
00206 
00207    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00208    *d = gvalue;
00209    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00210 }
